connector.description: Send DataSet jobs to an Apache Flink cluster.

camel.sink.path.endpointType.name: camel.sink.path.endpointType
camel.sink.path.endpointType.description: Type of the endpoint (dataset, datastream). One of: [dataset] [datastream]

camel.sink.endpoint.collect.name: camel.sink.endpoint.collect
camel.sink.endpoint.collect.description: Indicates if results should be collected or counted.

camel.sink.endpoint.dataSetCallback.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dataSetCallback
camel.sink.endpoint.dataSetCallback.description: Function performing action against a DataSet.

camel.sink.endpoint.dataStreamCallback.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dataStreamCallback
camel.sink.endpoint.dataStreamCallback.description: Function performing action against a DataStream.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.component.flink.dataSetCallback.name: camel.component.flink.dataSetCallback
camel.component.flink.dataSetCallback.description: Function performing action against a DataSet.

camel.component.flink.dataStreamCallback.name: camel.component.flink.dataStreamCallback
camel.component.flink.dataStreamCallback.description: Function performing action against a DataStream.

camel.component.flink.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.component.flink.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.flink.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.flink.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.component.flink.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.flink.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
